user.title: Azan Audio
user.description: Configure the azan audio source. Provide a YouTube URL or direct link to an audio file.

data_description.azan_url: YouTube or direct URL for the main azan audio
data_description.fajr_azan_url: Optional separate audio URL for the Fajr prayer

output_device.title: Output Device
output_device.description: Select the device to play the azan on. Smart speakers and Android phones with the HA Companion App are listed automatically.

android_settings.title: Android Settings
android_settings.description: Configure the external URL for Android playback. This is how your phone reaches Home Assistant to stream the audio.

data_description.external_url: The external URL your phone can reach Home Assistant at (e.g., your-ha.duckdns.org)

prayer_source.title: Prayer Times Source
prayer_source.description: Choose where to fetch prayer times from.

location.title: Location
location.description: Configure location for AlAdhan prayer time calculations.

schedule.title: Schedule & Prayers
schedule.description: Configure the offset and which prayers to play azan for.

data_description.offset_minutes: Play the azan this many minutes before the actual prayer time

suhoor.title: Suhoor Alarm
suhoor.description: Configure the pre-dawn meal alarm that plays before Fajr.

data_description.suhoor_offset_minutes: How many minutes before Fajr to play the Suhoor alarm (default: 60)
data_description.suhoor_ramadan_only: Only play during Ramadan (auto-detected via Hijri calendar)
data_description.suhoor_url: Optional separate audio for Suhoor. Leave empty to use the main azan audio.
